es.upv.grc.grcbox.server.multicastProxy.scampi

Class ScampiProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.upv.grc.grcbox.server.multicastProxy.MulticastProxy
      • es.upv.grc.grcbox.server.multicastProxy.scampi.ScampiProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ScampiProxy
extends MulticastProxy
    This plugin will process the payload of the UDPAdvertise by natting the source IP. It will also automatically creates INCOMMING and OUTGOING rules according to UDPAdvertise contents.
